title: [Empath Guild, Foyer]
description: Lustrous ceramic tiles radiate from a gilded marble plaque in concentric rings in a spectrum of soft pastel hues.  Plush runners flank the wide corridors of the entryway to the Ta'Illistim Empath Guild.  Sunlight filters in through tall windows, brightly illuminating the hall.

Lustrous ceramic tiles radiate from a gilded marble plaque in concentric rings in a spectrum of soft pastel hues.  Plush runners flank the wide corridors of the entryway to the Ta'Illistim Empath Guild.  Silvery moonlight filters in through tall windows, casting the hall in an ethereal glow.
